Prodigy Join more than million students, teachers, parents and school leaders using our zero cost math learning platform for grades 18!

The following is important information regarding our newly revised Food Distribution Schedule. Starting today, April 20th, until further notice, SCESD will serve meals Monday through Wednesday from 11:30am - 1:00pm.
On Monday and Wednesdays, we will continue to distribute meals from our (9) regular site locations. On Tuesdays, we will ONLY serve meals at Kammann, Mission Park and Sherwood Elementary schools.
Students will receive a free bagged lunch and breakfast for the following day to any children, ages 1 - 18, in any easy drive-thru or walk up location. On Wednesdays, students will receive an additional (4) meals for Thursday and Friday.
We highly recommend using the drive-thru and, if possible, use a face mask. If you walk up, please practice social and physical distancing protocols.
For more information about our Food Distribution schedule, please visit our website at salinascityesd.org.

The following is important information regarding our newly revised Food Distribution Schedule. Starting today, April 20th, until further notice, SCESD will serve meals Monday through Wednesday from 11:30am - 1:00pm.
On Monday and Wednesdays, we will continue to distribute meals from our (9) regular site locations. On Tuesdays, we will ONLY serve meals at Kammann, Mission Park and Sherwood Elementary schools.
Students will receive a free bagged lunch and breakfast for the following day to any children, ages 1 - 18, in any easy drive-thru or walk up location. On Wednesdays, students will receive an additional (4) meals for Thursday and Friday.
We highly recommend using the drive-thru and, if possible, use a face mask. If you walk up, please practice social and physical distancing protocols.
For more information about our Food Distribution schedule, please visit our website at salinascityesd.org.

header.h2: Subscribe And Stay Connected With Your District

div.p: Include your email address to receive news and updates that keeps you informed throughout your child's school year
We, without a doubt,respect your privacy.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: 840 South Main Street | Salinas, California 93901 | Phone: (831) 753 - 5600 Fax: (831) 753-5610 | Get Directions

SCESD prohibits discrimination, harassment, intimidation, and bullying based on actual or perceived ancestry, age, color, disability, gender, gender identity, gender expression, nationality, race or ethnicity, religion, sex, sexual orientation, or association with a person or a group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics.
Non-discrimination Policy | Sexual Harassment Policy | Uniform Complaint Procedures | Accessibility Statement

div.h3: "Education is not received. It is achieved." - Albert Einstein

div.p: Salinas City Elementary School District, located in Salinas, California, serves around 9,00 students from Pre-K through 6th Grade within a District of 14 schools.
Salinas City Elementary School District | 840 S Main St, Salinas, CA, 93901
